name: littlesmartbox
short_description: Little Smart Box is known as a UK seller for custom Android TV Boxes. Bespoke firmware and software ensures you get the most from your box.  Customised XBMC  with addons such as Naxi-X, Ice Films, Mashup, Sports Devil, 1Channel and 100's more, causing this to be the best android tv box readily available.  Always updated with the most recent add-ons and software with the Little Smart Box Wizard. See your favorite TV Shows, Movies and Sports.  Includes popular streaming services such as Netflix, BBC iPlayer and much more! Play all your old favorite game utilizing emulators or play the latest games from the Google Play Store all on Little Smart Box. Customer care through the website is free for the life of the product, our technical knowledge is the best in the business.
